option.name: lastCode
option.value:
<?php
//Tinker away!
use App\Models\StudentCourseRegistration as SCR;
use App\Models\TransactionMaster as TM;
use App\Models\TransactionDetail as TD;
$id =TM::where('student_course_registration_id',2)->first()->id;
$credit = TD::where('transaction_master_id',1)->where('transaction_type_id',2)->sum('amount');

$tm_ids=TM::where('reference_transaction_master_id',$id)->get()->pluck('id');

$debit=TD::whereIn('transaction_master_id',$tm_ids)->where('transaction_type_id',1)->sum('amount');
$total_due = $credit - $debit;
